IDENTIFICATION BY MASS SPECTROMETRY [LARGE SCALE ANALYSIS]

comment.text: Interacts with FMR1 (via N-terminus). Interacts with DDX6 (PubMed:26184334).
Distribution is cell cycle-modulated, being cytoplasmic in the G2/M phase and accumulating in nucleus during the G1 phase (PubMed:12837692).

property.value: Expressed in blood and 218 other tissues
